sentences.sentence: A lone gunman wearing a bulletproof vest opened fire in an apartment and a hospital in the Dutch

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: port city of Rotterdam on Thursday, killing two people and seriously injuring a 14-year-old girl, police said. The shooting sent patients and medics fleeing the Erasmus Medical Center in downtown Rotterdam, including some who were wheeled out of the building in beds. Others barricaded themselves into rooms and stuck handwritten signs to windows to show their location. The police told reporters the shooter was a 32-year-old student from Rotterdam.

sentences.sentence: It happened in the residential area in Fulorø, north of the city of Uppsala.

sentences.sentence: Investigators say the 25 year old victim was a neighbour of the targeted premises and had no criminal links.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: French President Emmanuel Macron has proposed a limited form of autonomy for Corsica on a visit to the Mediterranean island.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The territory has been part of France since the 18th century, but has been subjected to a sometimes violent campaign for independence in recent decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Macron gave few details, but spoke of changing the constitution to reflect Corsican identity. Macron a donné quelques détails, mais a parlé de changer la Constitution pour refléter l'identité corsicaine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ayons l'audace de bâtir une autonomie à la Corse, dans la République.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Cette autonomie doit être le moyen pour construire ensemble l'avenir sans désengagement de l'État.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ce ne sera pas une autonomie contre l'État, ni une autonomie sans l'État, mais une autonomie pour la Corse et dans la République.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Cette émission a été bien reçue par l'Assemblée des îles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Un campagneur de l'autonomie a dit qu'il était satisf que ça ne suffira pas à ce stade à garantir la sortie politique et qu'on a encore besoin de beaucoup travailler au cours des prochains mois.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Macron a proposé une timeline de six mois pour que le gouvernement français et les partis locaux s'agissent sur un texte pour des propositions d'autonomie.

sentences.sentence: Aucune changement à la Constitution ne permettrait pas l'approuvée du Parlement français.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A 14-year-old pupil has been arrested after three teachers and two pupils were stabbed at a secondary school in Jerez de la Frontera, southern Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The attacker was armed with two kitchen knives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The victims were struck several times shortly after classes started in the morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A classmate quoted by Spanish media described the accused as always quiet in class and alone during recess and admitted that there were classmates who made jokes about him. Four of the five injured were taken to hospital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In the UK, there's consistent growth in the number of people who say they regret Brexit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Around 62% of Britons believe leaving the EU is a failure, according to the UK polling company YouGov. Food prices have risen 25% from January 2021, a consequence of the extra trade barriers from leaving the single market.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, researchers at the Centre for European Reform say business investment was 23% lower than it would have been in 2021 due to Brexit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Rejoiners say the public is ahead of politicians in calling for the UK to rejoin the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: I think it's the reality of the cost of living crisis that people who may have been wrapped up in the ideology, the debates that we had six years, seven years ago about all that sovereignty stuff, of Britain standing on its own and all that sort of stuff, have just come face to face with the fact that there are more important things in life. Can you feed your kids? Right now, half of low income families in the UK are skipping meals to feed their kids. We cannot afford Brexit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: If we can't afford food, we can't afford Brexit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But the process in joining the EU is deeply complex. Moreover, there's no precedent for a country rejoining and the EU has changed significantly since the UK voted to leave in 2016.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile there are several other countries waiting in the wings including Ukraine as well as countries in the Western Balkans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: However it can be said that the UK side has decided to have a more pragmatic, closer relationship with Brussels in recent months, including when the British rejoined the EU's Horizon Science Programme. I think there's a very interesting point you're pointing to, which is the EU isn't an enlargement process now, not only about the Western Balkans, it's also about Ukraine, it's also about Moldova and potentially beyond, and that is in itself a very big challenge to the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile there's no appetite currently for politicians on either side, either the UK or the EU, to reopen what was a deeply corrosive debate. Polls show a strong outlook for a Labour-led government in the UK in the next year. However, its leader Keir Starmer has ruled out a return to the EU. Shona Murray, Euronews, Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Spanish police have raided the referee's committee offices as part of an investigation into alleged corrupt payments by Barcelona to an official.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The probe began in March with allegations that the Catalan side paid over 7 million euros to firms owned by Jose Maria Enriquez Negreira, a former committee vice president.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: No arrests were made during the Madrid search and Barcelona has so far denied any wrongdoing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: UEFA, which has provisionally cleared the club for this season's Champions League, is also investigating the matter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Veteran actor Michael Gambon has died at the age of 82.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He was known to many as Hogwarts headmaster Albus Dumbledore in six of the eight Harry Potter films.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: An accomplished stage actor, winner of three Olivier's and a Tony, his screen performances included The Cook, The Thief, His Wife and Her Lover, The King's Speech, Gosford Park and Paddington.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He won four BAFTAs for roles including The Singing Detective.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: His publicist said he died of pneumonia.
